title.rendered: BC PNP High Demand Occupation List 2023

  • Eligibility Requirements for BC PNP 2023
  • Construction and Engineering Occupations
  • Tech Occupations
  • Business Occupations
  • Healthcare Occupations
  • Education and Social Services Occupations
  • Management Occupations
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]British Columbia has numerous provincial nominee programs designed to help workers from specific fields immigrate to Canada. This includes people working in occupations considered in high demand in the country.

BC PNP Program helps the province with labour shortages by giving Canadian companies access to skilled foreign workers. This BC PNP High Demand Occupation List 2023 will help you determine whether your occupation is considered “in-demand” for the BC PNP.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”BC PNP Points Calculator” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/bc-pnp-points-calculator/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Eligibility Requirements for BC PNP 2023

Prospective workers who intend to apply for the BC PNP in 2023 must meet the following requirements:

  • a full-time job offer from a BC employer. This job must fall under the National Occupational Classification (NOC) TEER 0, 1, 2 or 3 categories.
  • a minimum of 2 years of work experience in the occupation they will perform in BC.
  • Demonstrate enough funds to support themselves and their family in BC.
  • Wage rates are comparable to the standard wage rate for the occupation in BC.
  • Demonstrate language proficiency if their job offer falls under TEER 2 or TEER 3.
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”12927″ animation=”None” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Apply for BC PNP with Licensed Experts

[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”Book a consultation” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/book-consultation/business-immigration/” margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP High Demand Occupation List 2023″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_id=”eligibility”][vc_column_text]The British Columbia in-demand occupation list 2023 is as follows.

Construction and Engineering Occupations in Demand

TEER CategoryNOCOccupation Title
070010Construction Managers
121310Electrical Engineers
121300Civil Engineers
121301Mechanical Engineers
121200Architects
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1670933514251{margin-top: 10% !important;}”]

Tech Occupations in Demand under BC PNP 2023

TEER CategoryNOCOccupation Title
121231Software designers and engineers
252120Illustrators and graphic designers
222220Computer network technicians and web technicians
121234Web programmers and developers
121222IT specialists
121233Web designers
121230Computer system programmers and developers
121232Software programmers and developers
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1670933526412{margin-top: 10% !important;}”]

Business Occupations Which are in High Demand in BC 2023

TEER CategoryNOCOccupation Title
111201Business management consulting occupations
111202Advertising, public relations, and marketing occupations
111100Accountants and financial auditors
212200Bookkeepers and accounting technicians
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1670933740187{margin-top: 10% !important;}”]

Healthcare Occupations In-Demand in British Columbia

TEER CategoryNOCOccupation Title
232122Medical sonographers
131103Veterinarians
131100Lab medicine and clinical specialists
131121Nutritionists
131301Registered nurses and psychiatric nurses
333102Nurse aides and patient service professionals
131203Occupational therapists
333101Medical lab assistants and technicians
232101Licensed practical nurses
131202Physiotherapists
131102Family physicians and general practitioners
232123Electrophysiological diagnostic and cardiology technologists
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1670933551133{margin-top: 10% !important;}”]

Management Occupations In-Demand in BC 2023

TEER CategoryNOCOccupation Title
010020Managers at real estate, insurance, and financial brokerage offices
060010Sales managers
060030Food service and restaurant managers
060020Wholesale trade and retail managers
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1670933578356{margin-top: 10% !important;}”]

In-Demand Occupations in Education and Social Services

TEER CategoryNOCOccupation Title
242201Community and social service workers
141210College and other educational institution instructors
141200University lecturers and professors
242202Childhood educators and associated assistants
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”12928″ animation=”None” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Start Your BC PNP Process with ELAAR

[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” open_new_tab=”true” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”Enquire Now” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/book-consultation/” margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Need help?” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]As you can see, numerous jobs fall under the British Columbia in-demand occupation list for 2023. If you have work experience in an occupation mentioned in this BC PNP in-demand occupation list and wish to immigrate to Canada, you can apply for British Columbia PNP.

Our team of Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultants understands the BC PNP immigration process and can optimize your immigration application to boost your chances of successfully immigrating to British Columbia. Contact Colossus Migration to start the process today.

  • BC PNP Language Requirements (All Streams)
  • 5 Ways to Get a Job Offer for BC Tech Pilot
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-4-percent” column_padding_tablet=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”left-right” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”4/12″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJtbC1mb3JtLWVtYmVkJTIyJTBBJTIwJTIwZGF0YS1hY2NvdW50JTNEJTIyMzgxOTE0NiUzQWIyYzNtMHIxYzklMjIlMEElMjAlMjBkYXRhLWZvcm0lM0QlMjI1NDY1NDI2JTNBdTJ4Mms4JTIyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Trending Stories” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1644853159092{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][recent_posts style=”list_featured_first_row” columns=”1″ category=”all” order=”DESC” orderby=”date” image_loading=”default” blog_remove_post_date=”true” blog_remove_post_author=”true” blog_remove_post_comment_number=”true” blog_remove_post_nectar_love=”true” posts_per_page=”5″ post_offset=”1″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: British Columbia’s growing economy needs skilled workers in in-demand occupations. Here is the BC PNP High Demand Occupation List 2023.
